```{r data generation, echo = FALSE, results = "hide"}

library("prob")
sc <- NULL
while(is.null(sc)) {
  
  n1 <- sample(1:5, 1)
  n2 <- 6 - n1
  x <- c(sample(1:2, 1), rep(3, n1), rep(5, n2), sample(6: 9, 1))
  XX <- sort(unique(x))
  tab <- table(x) / length(x)
  pmf <- tibble(
    x = XX,
    px =tab
  )
  entropy <- function(p) {
    -sum(p * log2(p))
  }
  sol <- entropy(pmf$px)
  sc <- num_to_schoice(sol, range = c(0.5, 3), delta = 0.5, digits = 4)
}
```
